burn.in.label: Burn-in:
burn.in.description: The number of iterations that will be skipped ("burnt in&quot) before training.

idf.label: Use tf-idf term weighting
idf.description: If enabled, terms will be weighted according to their term frequencyâ€“inverse document frequency (tf-idf).

iterations.label: Iterations:
iterations.description: The number of training iterations that will be performed.

iterations.at.once.description: The number of iterations performed at once.

min.cf.label: Min. word frequency:
min.cf.description: The minimum total occurrence of a word to be part of the training data.

min.df.label: Min. document frequency:
min.df.description: The minimum number of documents in which a word needs to occur to be part of the training data.

optimize.every.label: Optimize every:
optimize.every.description: The optimization interval for the model parameters, in training iterations.

remove.top.n.label: Remove top N words:
remove.top.n.description: The number of most common words to be considered stop words and removed from the training data.

threads.description: The number of worker threads to be used, or zero for automated multi-threading. WARNING: If multithreading is used, the training process might not be reproducible even with the same seed.
